item.description:
Get ready to taste Wine! Save The Date! Save The Date! Get ready to taste Wine!

The Boston Wine Expo for 2008 has been announced & their web-site is being updated daily with information re: exhibitors and other activities.

TICKETS ARE NOW ON SALE!! Go to Boston Wine Expo and click on "Buy Tickets".

NOTE: The fee listed for this event is the price at the door for a single day ticket (Sunday). Which is $85 = most expensive ticket price.

**** If you buy your ticket in advance - BEFORE February 2nd, 2008 - & take ****
**** advantage of The Boston Globe discount, the ticket will cost you ****
**** $75 (advance purchase price) less the $20 Boston Globe discount = $55 ****
**** IT WILL BE 30% CHEAPER IF YOU BUY YOUR TICKET BEFORE Feb. 2nd !!! ****

To get the Boston Globe discount, use promotion code EXTRAS when prompted during the ticketing process.

[FYI: There is a $2.50 service fee added to all tickets purchased via the web-site.]
item.name: 17th Annual Boston Wine Expo
